entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Algonquin Park (Brent)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:43 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 10:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
Temperature: -6.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -7.5°C
Wind: ENE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
